summary:
## Stability & Reliability Improvements

### Taskbar Clock Seconds Persistence
- Fixed an issue where taskbar clock seconds did not persist after enabling/disabling.
- Registry changes now correctly restart Windows Explorer to apply UI updates.
- Explorer is stopped and allowed to auto-relaunch with a short delay for consistency.

### Service Restart Handling
- Improved `RestartAsync` logic to detect disabled services before attempting a restart.
- Disabled services now return a clear failure message instead of partially executing stop/start logic.

---

## Performance & Memory Optimizations

### Navigation & Memory Leak Fixes
- Fixed a critical memory leak caused by `SmoothScrollBehavior` not cleaning up event handlers when pages were unloaded.
- ScrollViewer subscriptions are now properly detached on unload, preventing lingering render ticks.
- Prevented navigation journal retention by configuring the main frame to own its journal.

### ViewModel Lifecycle Management
- Added proper disposal to `ProcessPreferencesViewModel` to unhook shared tickers and event handlers when pages are evicted from cache.
- SmartPageCache now disposes cached ViewModels, keeping the dispatcher and UI thread clean.

### Panel & Visual Tree Cleanup
- Improved cleanup logic for `VirtualizingAdaptiveTilePanel` and `AdaptiveTilePanel` when removed from the visual tree.
- Cached layout state, row height data, and owner subscriptions are now released correctly.

---

## UI & UX Enhancements

### Busy State Simplification
- Simplified the maintenance page busy experience to reduce animation overhead.
- Replaced animated overlays with a lightweight translucent backdrop, compact card, and indeterminate progress indicator.
- Reduced UI lag by switching from animated fades to direct opacity and interaction toggles.

### Title Bar Visibility Fix
- Fixed an issue where title bars disappeared when navigating back to cached pages.
- Ensured title bars reattach correctly on page visibility changes for cached views.

---

## Virtualization Improvements

- Virtualizing panel now safely falls back to full realization when no `ScrollOwner` or virtualization flags are present.
- Enabled virtualization across high-cardinality views:
  - PathPilot runtime grid
  - Install Hub bundle list
  - Catalog results
  - Known Processes catalogs and segments
  - Performance Lab lists (Templates, Scheduler Processes, AutoTune Processes)
- Recycling and cache hints added to reduce UI memory usage and improve scrolling performance.

---

## Startup Management Enhancements

### New Startup Detection Types
Added detection for previously hidden or legacy startup locations:
- Winlogon (Shell, Userinit, Taskman)
- Active Setup components
- Custom Shell Folder paths
- Explorer-specific Run keys
- AppInit DLLs
- Image File Execution Options (IFEO)
- BootExecute entries

### Startup Control & Safety
- Added enable/disable support for new startup types with automatic backup and restore.
- High-impact startup sources are now classified as system-critical for safety.
- Background startup guard now enforces these new categories.

---

## Security & Scan Accuracy

### Windows Defender Scan Results
- Fixed incorrect “Unknown” scan results when Defender returned exit code 0.
- Clean files now correctly report **Known Good** with clear messaging.
- Improved user-facing scan messages for Known Good, Known Bad, and Unknown outcomes.

---

## Data Integrity Improvements

- Automatically filters out stale entries where files no longer exist on disk.
- Persistent storage is auto-cleaned to prevent removed entries from reappearing.
